attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877277292. The Suzuki  Ertiga is a stylish and ergonomically designed seven-seater with a powerful and responsive engine. It has space for the driver plus six people, luggage and all the enthusiasm you can muster.
This multi-purpose car boasts a long wheelbase, high headroom, ample legroom, and conscious positioning of the seats to ensure more than enough space for everyone

attributes.title: 2021 Suzuki Ertiga 1.5 GL Auto

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. The Perfect FIT For Your Lifestyle
The all-new Honda Fit offers outstanding efficiency, comfort and class-leading specifications.
The design is new, the infotainment system is up to date, there are plenty of places to charge things and the screens are high-resolution. The powertrain is on point too; those who are particularly concerned with fuel economy will appreciate the Fit’s light consumption figures. Class-leading is the best way to describe the cabin space in the Fit. It’s very comfortable inside and passenger space is certainly at the top of the hatchback segment. Black roof and 15" Alloy rims are additional

This vehicle comes with standard 5 Year/200,000km Warranty, 4 Year/60,000km service plan & 3 Years AA Roadside Assist.

Finance Available to all Approved Buyers, Trade in's are Welcome and Delivery Nationwide.

attributes.description:

This new model is filled with new action-packed features, aggressive front grille and eyes that shine with excitement. The new WR-V is daring to go. Are you?


This vehicle comes with a 5 year / 200000km warranty, 4 year / 60000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance.

Book your test drive today!

attributes.description: For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239317. Full Service History. Accessories worth R15000. This bakkie is big, it is tough and it is practical with enough space inside to be comfortable and a big loadbox. The 2.2 engine is a beauty, lovely growl and very powerful engine. This beautiful Ranger is very well looked after and is truly a great all rounder. We provide a Roadworthy certificate and a 160 multi-point Ford Approved quality check on all of our vehicles for your peace of mind. Call CMH Ford Gezina today to arrange a test drive with any of our professional and friendly sales executives. Any trade-in welcome, we guarantee R10,000 more on any written offer. Easy finance available within 3 hours. The price excludes dealer fees and smash and grab protection film. Errors and omissions Reserved. T&Cs apply.

attributes.title: 2019 Ford Ranger 2.2 TDCi XL Auto Double-Cab

attributes.description: For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239317. Only x1 Raptor Special Edition available. Designed to thrive in the world’s most brutal environments and to handle the most aggressive off-road driving. The Raptor is also filled with luxuries which will insure comfort, no matter what terrain you take on especially with the Race-Bred suspension, Fox Racing Shocks and purpose-built sports seats. A leading-edge Terrain Management System offers 6 driving modes to conquer any terrain easily at the push of a button, you can choose between Normal, Sport, Grass Gravel or Snow, Mud Sand Rock and Baja mode. Price excludes License, Reg, Doc & delivery fees. Trade in’s welcome and finance available. Offer valid while stock last. Terms and Conditions Applied.

If you are looking for a Double cab, no need to look any further. This Ford Ranger Double Cab is the vehicle just for you. Very impressive over loose and corrugated gravel. Ideal to have as a workhorse or a family vehicle.

Book your test drive today!

attributes.description:
NEW ARRIVAL/NOT RECON YET
(The car has not been in for any prep work,Valet or repairs etc because of it being a new arrival)

+ Optional 12 Month Warranty Available.

+ Vehicle is in a immaculate condition, come and view this vehicle.

+ We Deliver Nationwide, we are based just 40 min from Johannesburg.

+ Finance can be arranged.

+ Trade-Ins Welcome.

Why you must buy from Koos & Mike Used Cars:

1. Our Prices includes on the road cost.(CASH BUYS)

2. All our cars comes with a roadworthy certificate.

3. All cars will be delivered with a oil service before delivery.

4. Paperwork is our priority and not your responsibility.

5. Finance approvals is our goal.

6. You are our customer our advertisement and our reference for tomorrow.

7. The first 5 services on the car will be half price.

8. Warranty option available on all our cars (not included in selling price, can be taken out additionally)

9. We buy decent cars for cash.

10. All our cars have cartrack pre-installed. (Ts & Cs apply)

11. You get 1 free Valet for your vehicle before delivery

12. We offer an optional warranty package on all our vehicles with an R 7990 - R 19 000 installment

13. Ts & Cs APPLY

Please contact us for vehicle availability before you waste time and money on transport (our stock sells fast)
